hotels.title: Fiji Novotel Lami Bay Luxury near Suva with Onsite Restaurant & Gin Lounge
hotels.description: Uncover the serene beauty of Fiji's Lami Bay with a stay at this waterfront gem. This tranquil retreat offers panoramic views of the South Pacific Ocean, while its spacious rooms provide a comfortable haven after a day of exploration. Savour the flavours of the Pacific Rim at Husk Restaurant or sample from a wide selection of gins at Tonique Gin Lounge. With Suva's city centre, the Fiji Museum, and Colo-I-Suva Forest Park within easy reach, you'll find endless opportunities for adventure and discovery. Discover Fiji, relax in peaceful surroundings, eat delicious food, feel pampered - all is possible for your Fiji vacation.
